sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Caterpillar topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.2%.
Year to date, Caterpillar has lost about 0.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Walmart, trading down 0.2%.
Walmart Inc is lower by about 3.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 0.1%, and DowDuPont, trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
